translations.title: I Love One Direction
translations.infoPageSubmitText: Have a great One Direction picture like today's.
translations.infoPageCopyrightText: We are a user based application. Images may be used subject to copyright.
translations.errorInternetAlertText: Error downloading the images from the internet. Please check internet connectivity.
translations.uglySuggest: Thanks for your ugly photo, check every day to see if your photo is there.
